comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
Devata.6589:

Do we have an ETA on this? And will the GW2 wiki be updated with the relevant information.

https://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/API:Main

Maybe before HoT ships?

The wiki is mostly community-run, but y’all seem to update it fairly quickly so I imagine it’ll be updated once the endpoints are released.

comments.author: Devata.6589
comments.body:
Do we have an ETA on this? And will the GW2 wiki be updated with the relevant information.

https://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/API:Main

I am mainly waiting for many of the guild-stuff and some of the WvW stuff, so keep checking the GW2 wiki to see if anything has been added.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
El Psy Congroo.7965:

Is that the only way?

Currently, yes.

comments.author: El Psy Congroo.7965
comments.body:
Is that the only way?
As you have to be logged in to see the leaderboard filtered.
I would like anyone to see the list of members.

comments.author: Nabrok.9023
comments.body:
No official way as of yet.

You can look at the achievements leaderboard and filter by guild.

comments.author: El Psy Congroo.7965
comments.body:
Is there a way to get the members list of a guild using the API?
I looked at the wiki and found nothing (just to get the id, name, tag and emblem of a guild).
So, is there a way to get the list of members of a guild?

Cheers!
